comment.author: 9476071@N03
comment._content:
Jean Goldkette is a good hot musician from the 20's. But my favorite is Ben Bernie.

Anyway the music of that era is better than the cacaphony of noise they dance to nowdays. And they always play so loud at the gym I go to.

The 1920's had the worst liquor and the good music; now we have good liquor and BAD music!
